DocAttribute.Name: ResourceIdentifier
DocAttribute.Documentation: Optional identification of a code or ID for the construction resource

DocAttribute.Name: ResourceGroup
DocAttribute.Documentation: The group label, or title of the type resource, e.g. the title of a labour resource as carpenter, crane operator, superintendent, etc.

DocAttribute.Name: ResourceConsumption
DocAttribute.Documentation: A value that indicates how the resource is consumed during its use in a process (see _IfcResourceConsumptionEnum_ for more detail)

DocAttribute.Name: BaseQuantity
DocAttribute.Documentation: The basic (i.e. default, or recommended) unit that should be used for measuring the volume (or amount) of the resource and the basic quantity of the resource fully or partially consumed.
